concept.title: Channels and Patterns
concept.shortdesc: You can specify channels and patterns to define the data that the Redis Consumer origin processes.

conbody.p: Redis Consumer originchannels and patternschannelsRedis ConsumerpatternsRedis ConsumerYou can list individual channels and glob-style patterns. When you define a pattern, the origin reads from all channels with names that match the pattern. For example, the *log* pattern subscribes to any channel with "log" in the channel name.
To avoid processing duplicate messages, do not subscribe to the same channel more than once. Redis allows messages to be read more than once by the same client.
